channel.title: Index on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Index on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Recipes, or information for everybody
item.description: This weblog has accumulated a number of recipes over time. Here's an index of sorts that makes it look like I've been writing a cookbook. (To be updated over time, as well.) Apple pancake "Dutch baby" Bi bim bap, a marinade for the vegetables Black bean tortilla casserole Blueberry and basil recipes Blueberry muffins with cardamom Burmese tea salad Butternut squash (AnnArbor.com) Coconut fried rice YUM Coconut squash soup, Molly's October Garlic Mustard for Earth Day (AnnArbor.

item.title: Local, seasonal recipe guide
item.description: It's harvest time, which means there are a lot of recipes you can do with food that you can buy locally. One thing that would help that a lot is finding the people who buy the same stuff you do, and who share the same tastes, and who can work with you to figure out how to stock up so you have enough on your shelves always to get a meal on the table.
